most_active_tickets.title: Unable to open Pieces Core Services

common_issues.title: Pieces Core Services Unauthenticated User Exception
common_issues.description: Users are unable to open Pieces Core Services due to an UnauthenticatedUserException.  This might be related to Pieces OS version incompatibility (current: 12.2.1, supported: 12.1.0 - 13.0.0) or issues with user authentication. Check login credentials, ensure the Pieces OS version is within the supported range, and verify network connectivity.

related_issues.title: Unable to open Pieces Core Services
related_issues.text:
Unable to open Pieces Core Services
Error: UnauthenticatedUserException

**Installation Details**

Succeeded: true
Path: /Applications/Pieces OS.app

**PiecesOS Information**

ID: A5EDBDBC-BF76-455C-8924-D257D29E1031
User: Anonymous
Current Version: 12.2.1
Min Version Supported: 12.1.0
Max Version Supported: 13.0.0
Local Port: 39300

**Device Information**

Operating System: MacOS
Current Version: Version 15.6.1 (Build 24G90)
Min Version Supported: 12.0.0 Monterey
Additional Device Information: {cpu_list: [{"architecture":"arm64","cores":8,"logicalProcessors":8,"l1Cache":{"value":65536,"units":"Bytes"},"l2Cache":{"value":4194304,"units":"Bytes"},"description":"Apple M2"}], gpu_list: [{"type":null,"unifiedMemoryArchitecture":true,"cores":10,"dedicatedVRam":null}], memory_info: {"totalRAM":{"value":17179869184,"units":"Bytes"}}, display_list: [{"nativeHeight":1600,"nativeWidth":2560,"scaledHeight":900,"scaledWidth":1440,"primary":true}, {"nativeHeight":1440,"nativeWidth":3440,"scaledHeight":1440,"scaledWidth":3440,"primary":false}]}
Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

recommendations: Investigate the root cause of the "Pieces Core Services Unauthenticated User Exception".
Prioritize resolution of issue 855, "Unable to open Pieces Core Services", due to its high activity level and potential impact on users.
Verify compatibility of Pieces OS version 12.2.1 with the supported range (12.1.0 - 13.0.0) and address any discrepancies.
Check user authentication mechanisms and ensure they are functioning correctly.
Review network connectivity requirements for Pieces Core Services and troubleshoot any potential issues.
